transcript.title: ARRANGMENTS FOR MEDIA - PRIME MINISTERS MELBOURNE MEETINGS
transcript.content:
1;
z
PRIME MINISTER 5/ 92
ARRANGEMENTS FOR MEDIA PRIME MINISTER'S MELBOURNE MEETINGS
Meetings with business and union leaders will take place in
the Prime Minister's office at 4 Treasury Place.
A media room has been made available on the ground floor of
Treasury Place. Tea and coffee facilities will be provided.
Media must carry identification for entry into Treasury
Place.
Media will not be permitted on the First Floor except for
organised picfacs.
Media will be advised of details of picfacs and availability
of Ministers by the Prime Minister's office at 4 Treasury
Place tomorrow ( Wednesday).
14 January 1992

2
The following is a schedule of meetings with Mr Keating,
Mr Dawkins, Mr Willis and Senator Button on Wednesday and
Thursday this week in Melbourne.
